text:
Hey, Upper East Siders, if there's one thing Blake Lively guarantees during her press tours, it's a show-stopping sartorial marathon and boyyyy did she up the ante on her latest run, wearing a series of particularly loud pantsuits.

Going the extra mile to promote her new film A Simple Favor, Lively seems to be dressing in sync with her character Emily's prim and proper style.

Let's break it all down:

Look #1: Double velvet in 90 degree heat and humidity.

B stepped out this past Friday (in nearly 90 degree heat) in the first of many menswear-themed outfits she'd be spotted wearing throughout her weekend-long press tour: a blue velvet Brunello Cucinelli suit with a burgundy velvet suit jacket layered on top.

BACKGRID

Naturally, the jacket was removed because...it was 87 degrees.

James Devaney // Getty Images

Look #2: Nothing says "Hey, look at me!" like a highlighter green suit.

Next came this neon green Versace suit, which was plucked straight off the Versace Spring/Summer 2019 runway show at Milan Men's Fashion Week in June. Lively added a touch of femininity to the menswear look and paired the suit with pink Christian Louboutin bejeweled heels, Lorraine Schwartz jewels, and a hot pink lip.

Gotham // Getty Images

Estrop // Getty Images

Look #3: Plaids and checkers and a Gossip Girl throwback.

On day two, the former Upper East Sider journeyed back to her Gossip Girl prep school roots and stunned in a very busy plaid/checkered Roland Mouret suit and tie, and accessorized with an embellished cream clutch.

James Devaney // Getty Images

Look #4: More is more is more.

This purple and green snake print Bottega Venetta shorts suit and Stuart Weitzman heels is a lotta look.

Splash News

Look #5: A pinstriped grand finale.

Lively wore a cream and black pinstripe three-piece suit from Zimmerman Resort 2019 for her last stop on this pantsuit press tour. Underneath the sleeveless vest, Lively wore a sheer lace collared shirt and nude heels.

James Devaney // Getty Images

James Devaney // Getty Images

Look #6: Pretty in (dusty) pink.

After a weekend of bold colors and prints, Lively opted for a more muted tone and reached for a dusty pink linen pantsuit from Vivienne Westwood. The actress layered the frayed trim jacket over a classic Sonia Rykiel white blouse and paired the outfit with white and brown oxford loafers.

Splash

With just a few weeks until the thriller officially debuts in theaters, it's likely B has a lot more enviable looks up her (menswear-inspired) sleeve.

title: Blake Lively Sure Is Wearing a Lot of Lively Suits
